job_details.Functieomschrijving: As a back-end engineer in the team, you'll be focusing on ensuring the scalability and reliability of the systems we've built around and integrated with our LLM (Large Language Models) infrastructure and traditional AI models.
job_details.full_text:
Back End Developer

As a back-end engineer in the team, you'll be focusing on ensuring the scalability and reliability of the systems we've built around and integrated with our LLM (Large Language Models) infrastructure and traditional AI models.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes building and maintaining systems around LLM infrastructure and traditional AI models, aligning with the core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer who focuses on developing and deploying applications built on generative models. While it mentions 'Back End Developer' in the title, the description's focus on LLM infrastructure and AI models points towards a GenAI specialization rather than general back-end development.

job_tasks.justification: The role focuses on 'ensuring the scalability and reliability of the systems we've built around and integrated with our LLM infrastructure and traditional AI models', which involves traditional software engineering tasks to support AI systems.
job_tasks.phrase: ensuring the scalability and reliability of the systems we've built around and integrated with our LLM infrastructure and traditional AI models

job_tasks.justification: The mention of 'LLM (Large Language Models) infrastructure and traditional AI models' indicates involvement in the core processes of creating, training, or adapting machine learning models, specifically generative and traditional AI.
job_tasks.phrase: LLM (Large Language Models) infrastructure and traditional AI models

job_tasks.justification: The focus on 'scalability and reliability of the systems' implies the need for building and managing infrastructure for deployed models, which is a key aspect of MLOps.
job_tasks.phrase: ensuring the scalability and reliability of the systems
